title: Foul Shot
description: Chicago Police detective Vince Bonelli’s life had been organized and comfortable when sexy Gina Gallo blew into it. Like a whirlwind, she changed everything, destroying parts of Vince’s life as she drew him close to her. Yet, while physical intimacy was not a problem for her, she would not let him past her mental and emotional barricades. Vince found that, while his life after meeting Gina was never dull, it was often traumatic and sometimes deadly.
author: R.L.  Cherry
